summary.span: 命名空間包含 類別，可提供強型別資源的支援。

span.span: The namespace contains the class, which provides support for strongly-typed resources.

summary.span: 自 .NET Framework 2.0 版起，藉由建立包含一組靜態唯讀 () 屬性的類別，這個編譯時期功能封裝對資源的存取，使得資源使用更容易。

span.span: Beginning with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this compile-time feature encapsulates access to resources by creating classes that contain a set of static read-only () properties, thus making it easier to consume resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細的強類型資源的詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information about strongly-typed resources, see .
